name: Captain Eliraf
appearance: A tall woman with sharp green eyes, wearing a long military coat adorned with medals.
background: Once a respected officer, now a rogue agent operating outside the chain of command.s
personality: Cunning and methodical, but still retains a surprising sense of humors.
goal: To dismantle the corrupt hierarchy that betrayed her, piece by piece.
benefit: Can call in favors from old contacts within the military.
special: Possesses classified knowledge of secret operations.

weaknesses.text: Short temper when dealing with bureaucracy

name: Scholar Veyra
appearance: A slender figure wrapped in layers of flowing robes, carrying an ancient tome.
background: Born into a secretive academic order, Veyra seeks forbidden knowledge to protect it from misuse.
personality: Quietly intense, obsessed with uncovering hidden truths.
goal: Unlock the secrets of a lost civilization before rival scholars get there first.
benefit: Knows the locations of several undiscovered ruins.
special: Can decipher ancient languages at a glance.

biases.text: Believes most people are too shortsighted to handle true knowledge.

name: COUNT BARTELBY LOTHEED
appearance: Bartelby is tall, thin, and handsome, with thick hair and expressive eyes.
background: Steward of the Palace of Birdsong.
personality: Bartelby is aloof, obsessive, and loyal to those he cares about. He is arrogant and charismatic in  equal measure. He’s exactly as courteous to others and the help as etiquette demands.
goal: Bartelby wants to maintain a tight grip on Meratt.

biases.text: Bartelby despises fools, and has no time for anyone without an Intelligence score of at least 14 (–2).
He admires fellow practitioners of the arcane arts (+2).

strengths.text: Bartelby has only contempt for nonhumans and feels they should know their place and  remain quiet. Invoking any sense of collective identity with non-humans raises his hackles.

weaknesses.text: Bartelby is greatly swayed by gaudy gifts. Anyone presenting him with a gift worth at least 500 gp gains a +1 bonus on checks to influence him.
